attributes.review: This app is so unacceptable and gross. I hope no one has to download this I was disappointed when I opened the app for the first time and was greeted with a Cheeto 🟠making a fist as if he was going to punch me 😭. And I almost fainted when I saw the Cheeto getting a spray tan Nude🤮🧚🏻‍♀️. And when my mother saw it on accident she passed out. So my sister kept giving cpr. I tried to call☎️ 911 but my phone immediately said in a low sad voice “bai bai” ✌️ and disappeared into thin air💨 out the window🖼. To the point where I screamed😭 which woke up my mom but when I looked outside my fish🐟smelled the fumes and died😖. And I really hope know one downloads this app and suffers😞 the way I did and now bye. I have to go walk my caterpillar.🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🧚🏻‍♀️🐛🐛🐛🐛
attributes.title: Unacceptable

attributes.review:
When I first opened the app, HOLY MOLLY!! This orange guy was standing there and it scared me so bad!!! He had this ugly face and now I have nightmares about it!! ❤️✨🧚‍♀️😘 and it says that I need to enter my phone number but I Don’t personally know this orange guy so why would I give him my phone number???🤔🤔 and it says “ KeEp AmErIcA gReAt AgAiN” but isn’t he only making it worse?? 🥱🥱 all i gotta say is there’s much more better apps in the App Store! DONT BUY THIS APP! 🙂🙂🙂😌😌😎✨
P.s: everyone deserves human rights ✨🧚‍♀️😘❤️ not this orange guy tho!✨🧚‍♀️ 
P.S: i🥵climed🧭out🥫of👋my🔒head🤯and⛸watched⏰myself👈implode💥a👅thought💭without ❌a⚠️body💤 oughta🎤be🐝the🏎 shot🔫 my brain🧠 is poisoned💉 and I’m searching🧐 for the anecdote🤕 but every time⏰ iℹ️find💅🏼 it😌 my✨defenses🥊 scream😱 oh no❌ you don’t😰 woah 😳
attributes.title: Ew

attributes.review: This app has got to be one of the worst things ever to reside in my cell phone. When I downloaded it, my phone immediately crashed. I had to go to the Apple Store to get it fixed, which cost me my precious money and time. When the phone finally began working again, I opened the app in order to find out when the next rally would be. Instead of any helpful information, I was instead greeted with some terribly inappropriate photos of the President, along with a slideshow titled “My Best Tweets That Show What a Great Leader and Articulate Speaker I Am I’m the Best President America Has Ever Seen Vote For Me Not Sleepy Joe.” Very unprofessional and rude. I cannot believe I downloaded this filth. If i could give less than one star I would.
attributes.title: Terrible experience!

attributes.review: When I downloaded it, it took almost a month to download 😦 then when I opened it the app took 100 dollars from me😑 then the app has horrible music playing and then ants started crawling on me! I think the music Simmons ants😦 then there was some weird pictures of orange monkeys but the monkey was in a suit? Pretty weird. But now my house has ants all over! Like my whole floor is ants!! Do now I have to move :( and we have to bulldoze my house because there are too many ants 🐜👺Also the app sent me an orangutan 🦧 now I have a pet orangutan that I can’t take care of because I have no house from this app!! I do not recommend getting a this app. You will end up homeless with a pet orangutan 🦧!!! PLEASE DO NOT GET THIS APP! Horrible app!!! >:(
attributes.title: Horrible app🦧

attributes.review: The president of the United States needs to be held at a much higher standard if he wants to actually make America “Great” but right now this app just proves how bad he is at doing that. The surveys are completely biased and therefore creates skewed data that should not be reputable to any degree. When it come to the app itself, it is extremely slow, taking 30 minutes just to download the app let alone the 10 hours it took to finally get signed in. Personally I believe something that spreads such false information should not be advertised and/or available for download in the United States because it is harmful to the citizens as well as our reputation around the rest of the world. 0/10 would never recommend.
attributes.title: Yeah, no

attributes.review: I have been down in this basement for 2 year and it all started when I downloaded this app. All I wanted to do is support our lovely deformed 🍊 and show my support but that’s not what happened . right after I downloaded the app I was kidnapped by orange rats wearing Trump merch then they took a dart with poison and shot it right at me I fainted and woke up in the most ugliest looking room covered in trump naked. My eyes started to bleed 🩸 in terror. Then trump showed up and gave me my phone to give him a five star ⭐️ review but I refused and tried escaping 🏃🏼‍♀️ . I completely failed and was handcuffed to my bed. Now here I am in a basement only allowed to drink Diet Coke with added sugar and an overcooked stake with sauce made out of horse 💩. If anyone get this message please help me.
attributes.title: I’m trapped in 🍊🐽🐷

attributes.review: After the three hour download time, I tried to open the app only for it to turn off my phone. Standard issues.  But it got worse. I started getting hundreds of notifications about “tweets” and “trump”. Who even is that guy? Some of the worst days of my life came from this app, I think it may promote devil worship. All my photos were deleted along with my apps, with the exception of the standard apps and the Trump app. All of this happened away from my home. Apparently this app tells everyone where I live, because my house had been ransacked. Doors were torn off their hinges, all my money was gone, and they slit my dogs throat. My dog is dead. That were all I had. My life is ruined and it’s all this apps fault.
attributes.title: Not very good

attributes.review: The reason i gave this app one star was because this is one of the worst apps ever when I downloaded it it took me hours to download not to mention there was a orange thing popping out of my screen which almost MADE MY PHONE BREAK!!! I was ANGRY about that because  I dropped my phone because I got scared yk I think u could relate not only that the 🍊made me have nightmares!!! My dog almost  had a heart attack!!! when she saw why I dropped my (phone she saw the 🍊) this made me very disappointed in the app I was going to give it a second chance! But then something else happened!!!! My other dog saw the 🍊and got so scared 😱 that his leg actually broke!!!! I was furious if I could I would give it a 0!! Worst app do not recommend!!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever made

attributes.review: it took 7 hours to install  🙄 and then it started giving me coupon links to buy trump apperal since no one else was buying them and they were going out of business so soon like wow what a shame ✨🤷🏻‍♀️💕🌈 Then it started directing me to links to groupon . com to give me discount codes on trump rallies since I was such a honorable supporter supporter 🌸☺️🧚🏻‍♂️💫 and ofc I ordered my tickets 🎫 but then I forgot I had to walk my pet fly and oof I also have to water my house that same day🏡 ughh but overall this app also kept giving me soo many ads about yeast infections and about plan b for teens (like omg almost as if they were reading my current life) overall my name is Karen and I support trump 2020 yuhhhhhh getttttt itttt tooo ittttt aaaamuuurriicaaaaa ❤️🇱🇷
attributes.title: Worst app ever
